entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 3.8°C

Humidity: 78 %

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023
